test_environment.note: E2E tests require frontend and backend running. Use: FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000 python -m pytest backend/tests/test_admin_e2e_navigation.py

recommendations: All navigation structure tests passed successfully
Admin cabinet is properly protected with is_staff checks
All sidebar menu items have corresponding routes
Admin API integration is properly configured
To run E2E tests, ensure frontend is running on http://localhost:3000
To run E2E tests, ensure backend is running on http://localhost:8000
